reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress to be of good quality with thick fabric, and one customer notes it's made of high-quality lined red plaid. The neck ruffle receives positive feedback, with one customer describing it as flattering. Customers disagree on whether the dress runs true to size, with some finding it runs small. The dress receives mixed feedback regarding fit, with some finding it good while others say it's too oversized for petite frames. The material weight is criticized for being extremely heavy, and customers find it hard to tie. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality lined red plaid A-line dress
items.body: Love this dress. A-line, fully lined and a perfect red plaid. I purchased a green cardigan from Amazon to wear with it if the weather turns colder. I purchased a XXL size that falls in soft folds around my body. I am 5’3” and 210 lbs. Read more
items.author: PS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress!
items.body: Beautiful, love the fabric, but a lil short for me, but it’s a great length for younger ladies! Read more
items.author: kay young

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs very large and is a heavy material
items.body: This is a very heavy thick material, so definitely not something for an outdoorsy or warm weather event. It also runs very large and look like a huge sack on me. I’m sure it looks lovely on some other body types, but definitely not for me. Also, if you’re doing pictures, this may not be a good option as you cannot see the bow from the front at all. Read more
items.author: Gesh

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars All polyester, stains come out easily
items.body: Bought this for a Halloween costume. Perfect for the occasion. Fit comfortably. Stains came out in the wash. Read more
items.author: Desiree V

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Might as well be non refundable
items.body: Shouldn’t have purchased. Too oversized for my petite frame. 125 lbs 5’7” don’t make my mistake because you literally can’t return for more than like 10x the cost of the dress. It’s nice quality, thick fabric, but if you’re not willing to eat the cost of the dress and initial shipping don’t risk it because the difficulty and expense of shipping back to China is ridiculous. Read more
items.author: Tori

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: I enjoyed the quality of the fabric and the fact that it wasn’t thin or see through. Perfect for Galantines or date night. Paired it with a pearl clutch and sparkly shoes. For reference I am 5’1 | 150lbs. | size medium Read more
items.author: Peter

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Sizing
items.body: Too tight in the bust . Read more
items.author: Jessie R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tuckernuck Dupe
items.body: Great quality for the price! Thick heavy material. Fits true to size. Deep navy color as pictured! Read more
items.author: Nicole Bryson

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Navy, White, Red Plaid, Dark Blue, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
